meanings.definition: A person, typically a transgender woman, who has undergone hormone therapy or surgery to develop female physical characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The shemales in the support group shared their experiences with hormone therapy.
meanings.sent2: Many shemales feel more comfortable after undergoing surgery.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a hilarious skit about shemales shopping for new clothes.
meanings.sent4: Her journey to becoming a shemale was like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The image of shemales embracing their true selves was empowering.

meanings.definition: A term used in the adult entertainment industry to describe individuals who possess both male and female genitalia.
meanings.sent1: The website featured a section dedicated to shemales in adult films.
meanings.sent2: Some people enjoy watching videos that include shemales.
meanings.sent3: The comedian made a joke about shemales that had the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fantasy, shemales were like mythical creatures with unique powers.
meanings.sent5: The magazine cover scandalized readers with its bold feature on shemales.
